Bee unknowingly devours a dope-spiked cake, and tension between revellers explodes in the darkened house during a game of Bodies Bodies Bodies. However, one member of the party soon plays a victim for real. Horror comedy, starring Amandla Stenberg, Maria Bakalova and Rachel Sennott Halina Reijn - Director Amandla Stenberg - Sophie Maria Bakalova - Bee Rachel Sennott - Alice Chase Sui Wonders - Emma Pete Davidson - David Myha'la Herrold - Jordan Lee Pace - Greg.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Fast Cars
programme.desc: Gear up for upcoming blockbuster Fast X and buckle in for a countdown of the best cars from each of the Fast and Furious films, from Brian's Toyota Supra to Dom's Dodge Charger.

programme.title: Champions
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Romance, Drama, Sport, Documentary And Factual, News And Current Affairs, Entertainment, Nature ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Basketball coach Marcus Marakovich drives home under the influence of alcohol and collides with a stationary police car. Judge Menendez sentences him to 90 days' community service teaching basketball to adults with intellectual disabilities at the Capitol East Recreation Centre. Comedy drama, starring Woody Harrelson and Kaitlin Olson Bobby Farrelly - Director Woody Harrelson - Marcus Kaitlin Olson - Alex Matt Cook - Sonny Ernie Hudson - Coach Phil Peretti Cheech Marin - Julio.

programme.title: Dear Elizabeth
programme.desc: Sid Straw is an office worker whose life takes a massive tumble when he tries to get in touch with an old classmate, who also happens to be international star Elizabeth Banks. When Sid starts mailing her on social media, believing they are private conversations, his actions have a devastating effect on his life. Director Scott Abramovitch's comedy based on a true story, starring Tony Hale, Paul Walter Hauser and Danielle Brooks Scott Abramovitch - Director Tony Hale - Sid Straw Elisha Cuthbert - Janet Berry-Straw Danielle Brooks - Wendy David Walton - Tom Straw Sarah Burns - Kate Drew Alan Tudyk - Dave Lambert Paul Walter Hauser - James Fisk.

programme.title: The Fabelmans
programme.desc: Period coming-of-age drama starring Michelle Williams, Paul Dano and Gabriel LaBelle. In 1950s Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman finds that using his dad's Super 8 camera helps him to work through his feelings. As he gets older, he dreams of making his hobby into a career, and he discovers that his camera teaches him more about people than he, or they, realises Steven Spielberg - Director Michelle Williams - Mitzi Fabelman Paul Dano - Burt Fabelman Gabriel LaBelle - Sammy Fabelman Seth Rogen - Bennie Loewy Julia Butters - Anne Fabelman Jeannie Berlin - Haddash Fabelman Judd Hirsch - Uncle Boris.

programme.title: To Leslie
programme.desc: A West Texas single mother wins the lottery and squanders it just as fast, leaving behind a world of heartbreak. Years later, with her charm running out and nowhere to go, she fights to rebuild her life and find redemption. Drama, starring Andrea Riseborough, Allison Janney and Stephen Root Michael Morris (3) - Director Andrea Riseborough - Leslie Marc Maron - Sweeney Allison Janney - Nancy Owen Teague - James Andre Royo - Royal Stephen Root - Dutch James Landry Hébert - Pete Matt Lauria - Handsome outlaw Mac Brandt - Bert the bartender Tom Virtue - Raymond (Leslie's father).

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Unlucky US assassin Ladybug is given a simple mission - retrieve a metal briefcase on a high-speed train departing from Tokyo. The pick-up is too easy, and Ladybug, together with other killers, soon discover their missions have something in common. programme.title: Emily the Criminal
programme.desc: A young woman drowning in debt gets involved in a credit card scam that pulls her into the criminal underworld of Los Angeles, with lethal consequences. programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'Artagnan
programme.desc: In 1627, gifted swordsman D'Artagnan heads to Paris with a letter of recommendation addressed to Captain De Treville, commander of the Musketeers. En route, D'Artagnan unknowingly interrupts a diabolical plot orchestrated by Milady. programme.title: A Thousand And One
programme.desc: Inez de la Paz serves time at Rikers Island and returns home to New York. Her six-year-old son Terry has been placed in foster care in her absence but when he has an accident, Inez spirits Terry out of the foster care system without permission and raises her boy under a different name. programme.title: Renfield
programme.desc: For more than 100 years, Robert Montague Renfield has been at the beck and call of his manipulative master, Count Dracula. When Renfield seeks refuge at a local church, a man who facilitates meetings for addicts of unhealthy relationships empowers the servant to stand up to his controlling boss. programme.desc: For the final time this year, Formula 1 goes racing as Yas Marina Circuit stages the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Will Max Verstappen bookend a record-breaking season with a 19th race win? (26.11).

programme.title: Bears @ Vikings Highlights
programme.desc: The Minnesota Vikings host the Chicago Bears in week 12 of the 2023 NFL. The Vikings enter this one having seen their five-game winning streak come to an end on the road at Denver. (27.11).

programme.title: Golf Academy: Davies Full Swing
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, English golf legend Laura Davies offers some top tips on the full swing.

programme.title: S/Lge: Grand Final Hlts
programme.desc: In this year's Betfred Super League Grand Final, five-time winners Wigan Warriors meet Catalans Dragons at Old Trafford. The French side seek their maiden Super League title here. (14.10).

programme.title: Golf Academy: Davies Full Swing
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, English golf legend Laura Davies offers some top tips on the full swing.

programme.title: Abu Dhabi F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Formula 1 goes racing as Yas Marina Circuit stages the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Will Max Verstappen bookend a record-breaking season with a 19th race win? (26.11).

programme.title: Bears @ Vikings Highlights
programme.desc: The Minnesota Vikings host the Chicago Bears in week 12 of the 2023 NFL. The Vikings enter this one having seen their five-game winning streak come to an end on the road at Denver. (27.11).

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:L'Pool/Man U '94
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, arch rivals Liverpool and Manchester United meet at Anfield back in 1994 in a match that saw one of the Premier League's great comebacks.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Swansea/C Palace '16
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Swansea City take on Crystal Palace at the Liberty Stadium in a high-scoring encounter in the 2016-17 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Charlton/WHU '01
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Charlton Athletic take on West Ham United at The Valley in November 2001 in a pulsating encounter that went down to the wire.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Man Utd 2002
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Manchester City take on Manchester United back in 2002 in the last Manchester derby to be played at Maine Road.

programme.title: PL Legends: Zola
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Chelsea forward Gianfranco Zola.

programme.title: My Icon: Ryan Atkin
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, English football's first openly gay referee Ryan Atkin discusses his experience in the sport, and his support for the Rainbow Laces campaign.

programme.title: My Icon: Tanni Grey Thompson Pt 2
programme.desc: One of Britain's most decorated Paralympians, former wheelchair racer Tanni Grey-Thompson speaks about the individuals that have inspired her throughout her life. Part 2.

programme.title: Cricket World Cup Greatest Games
programme.desc: Revisit a classic group stage contest from the 2007 ICC Cricket World Cup between India and Bangladesh.

programme.title: Nat Sciver Masterclass
programme.desc: England's Nat Sciver discusses her process of battling pressures and mindset after becoming the leading run-scorer in all formats in 2022.

programme.title: Super League Gold
programme.desc: Relive some classic Super League matches. Here, a look back at the 2015 Grand Final, as Leeds Rhinos and Wigan Warriors played out a tense match at Old Trafford.

programme.title: Live WBBL Challenger
programme.desc: The 2023 Women's Big Bash League finals continue with the Challenger. The winner here will advance to the final. (29.11).

programme.title: Cricket World Cup Greatest Games
programme.desc: Revisit a classic group stage contest from the 2007 ICC Cricket World Cup between India and Bangladesh.

programme.title: Your Game
programme.desc: On a mission to inspect the health of recreational cricket throughout the country, Charles 'Daggers' Dagnall visits grassroots clubs in the north west, midlands and the south.

programme.title: WSL Hlts: Man C V Spurs
programme.desc: Hot off their win in the Manchester derby, City face off with Tottenham Hotspur in a match from the 2023-24 Women's Super League. Spurs have drawn 1-1 in their last three matches. (26.11).

programme.title: Premier League Years 2020-2021
programme.desc: A chance to look back at a dramatic 2020-21 season in the Premier League.

programme.title: UNBEATABLE
programme.desc: This weekly magazine show covers all the action of the British Basketball League including highlights of each week's games, original features, interviews, top plays and bloopers.

programme.title: Ted's Notebook: Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Ted Kravitz is live following the season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix as he shares his thoughts on the race while gathering reaction from the paddock.

programme.title: My Icon: Martin Offiah
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former rugby league superstar Martin Offiah discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: ICC CWC Classics: ENG v SA 2019
